reviewText: Detailed -- easy even for a beginner.  I love Judith's quilting/piecing style.  Anyone interested in a more modern look using traditional log cabin blocks would be interested in this.  I particularly liked her concept that the blocks not be "perfect".  This is a simple technique --( but it produces complicated looking results. )  I can't wait to make this wallhanging!
It's very wonderfull...fantastic!!!! this dvd can help you to create fantastic quilt with simply technique! ...sorry for my english..bye bye
